text: Pizza was a good. We had a great coupon from Marianos for small pizza for $2.99. Kids loved that they had their own 1 topping pizza. Awesome steal. At this place no one washed their hands while dealing with food. Went from register to food handling.

text: Its your basic Papa Johns, but the guys that seem to run it are always friendly. Its a small thing, but it really does stand out when you go to any other franchise's location and dont feel you're being serviced well.

text: Everytime I order from papa John's they never bring me what I paid for I order extra garlic sauce and everytime I get my pizza there's no extra sauce. I just waited over an hour to get my pizza and my pizza looks old and of course no extra sauce.
